Package de.kuei.scm.lotsizing.dynamic.stochastic.solver

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStochasticLotSizingDPSolver  
    AbstractStochasticLotSizingFullEnumerationSolver
    A solver that enumerates all possible setup patterns and chooses the one with with the best objective value
    AbstractStochasticLotSizingSolver
    An abstract class for lot sizing solvers.
    StaticDynamicUncertaintyULHSolver  
    StaticDynamicUncertaintyWithADIULHSolver  
    StaticUncertaintySolver
    This solver calculates the solution for a stochastic dynamic lot sizing solution with static uncertainty strategy as proposed by Bookbinder & Tan [1988] with the modified objective function proposed by Popp [2014].
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SolvingInitialisiationException
    An Exception to be thrown when a solver cannot work because of missing that has yet to be initialised.
    WrongOptimisationOrderException
    An exception to be thrown if the optimisation is in the wrong order, e.g. no strict backwarts recursion
